summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 12 requirements from the BuildRequest. All requested pages (Home, About, Course/Syllabus, Join/Discord, VIP, Privacy, Contact) have been created with their specified content. Site-wide navigation and footer components are present. The backend includes contact form functionality. Testimonials and FAQ sections are implemented. The design uses a cohesive Go-themed color palette with Tailwind CSS and React/TypeScript as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support via ThemeProvider
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention dark mode or theme switching functionality. The App.tsx includes ThemeProvider from 'next-themes' with system theme support, and index.css defines extensive dark mode color variables.
Toast notifications for user feedback (success/error messages) were not requested in the BuildRequest. The implementation includes Sonner toast library and uses it in the ContactForm component.
The BuildRequest does not specify any third-party attribution or promotional links. The footer includes a 'Built with caffeine.ai' link with UTM tracking parameters.

While responsive navigation is required (REQ-11), the specific implementation using Sheet/Drawer component for mobile menu was not explicitly requested. This is an implementation detail that goes beyond the basic requirement.
